label.intro:
TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS: To be successful in this course, you will need:

  • reliable broadband internet access via a standard, up to date web browser
  • an up to date version of Adobe Acrobat Reader (use this link to update - *review/uncheck optional offers)
  • the ability to watch a video on YouTube (visit LincsEd to test).
